intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a comprehensive guide to the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) Riparian Zones Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) product for the years 2012 and 2018. It provides users with detailed information regarding product characteristics, methodologies, potential applications, quality assessment procedures, and technical support. The manual aims to equip users with the necessary knowledge to effectively utilise the Riparian Zones product for environmental monitoring, policy development, and ecosystem management within Europe.
